lead_paragraph: The Golden State Warriors were given a welcome boost on Saturday when coach Steve Kerr said that reigning NBA Most Valuable Player Stephen Curry was expected to play in Sunday's Game Four against the Houston Rockets.

headline.print_headline: Warriors' Curry Expected to Return for Game Four
headline.main: Warriors' Curry Expected to Return for Game Four
